edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.dao.mysql

类 ReasonCodesDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.dao.mysql.ReasonCodesDAO

  • public class ReasonCodesDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for managing the Reason Codes. DAO stands for Database Access Object. All DAOs are intended to be reflections of the database, that is, one DAO per table in the database (most of the time). For more complex sets of queries, extra DAOs are added. DAOs can assume that all data has been validated and is correct. DAOs should never have setters or any other parameter to the constructor than a factory. All DAOs should be accessed by DAOFactory (@see DAOFactory) and every DAO should have a factory - for obtaining JDBC connections and/or accessing other DAOs. The Override Reason Code (ORC) is a universal product identifier used in the United States for drugs intended for human use.
    作者:
    Andy
    另请参阅:
    http://www.fda.gov/Drugs/InformationOnDrugs/ucm142438.htm

    • 方法详细资料

      • getAllORCodes

        public java.util.List<OverrideReasonBean> getAllORCodes()
                                                 throws DBException
        Returns a list of all ND codes
        返回:
        A java.util.List of OverrideReasonBeans.
        抛出:
        DBException

      • getORCode

        public OverrideReasonBean getORCode(java.lang.String code)
                             throws DBException
        Returns a particular description for a given code.
        参数:
        code - The override reason code to be looked up.
        返回:
        A bean representing the override reason that was looked up.
        抛出:
        DBException

      • addORCode

        public boolean addORCode(OverrideReasonBean orc)
                  throws DBException,
                         iTrustException
        Adds a new override reason code, returns whether or not the change was made. If the code already exists, an iTrustException is thrown.
        参数:
        orc - The overridereason bean to be added.
        返回:
        A boolean indicating success or failure.
        抛出:
        DBException
        iTrustException

      • updateCode

        public int updateCode(OverrideReasonBean orc)
               throws DBException
        Updates a particular code's description
        参数:
        orc - A bean representing the particular override reason to be updated.
        返回:
        An int representing the number of updated rows.
        抛出:
        DBException
